questions.question: Is the cup half full or half empty?
choices: Ackschuvallyyyy! <adjusts spectacles> The cup can never be empty. Unless it is in a black hole.
What is a cup? Everything is maya. We live in a simulation called matrix.
questions.explanation: If you are unsatisfied with the answer, you can change it to that of your choice by modifying the json. Forge your own path. Take control. Be a Man!

questions.question: What is LOL?
choices: Something you type at the end of a horrible message to avoid repercussions.
It's a common expression. Pronounced Lawl, not lole like hole. Lawl. Repeat after me. LAWL
questions.explanation: As a boomer, in the voice of Narnia lion: I was there when it was written.

questions.question: Why is it called new moon when there is no moon visible?
choices: We should not question established norms.
When you buy a new product it is packed in a box and you can't see it. Similarly when you can't see the moon, it means it's a new moon.
questions.explanation: The first index in an array is zero. Similarly when moon is not visible it is considered the first phase, hence new moon. This is just something I'm typing to have some explanation text. Don't come after me for programming, astronomy and religion related inconsistencies.

questions.question: When did winter come to westeros?
choices: It's yet to come. Probably in Season 28
Viewers didn't care. They just wanted copious amounts of sex and gore. And the show delivered
questions.explanation: The bigger question is when will George R.R Martin finish the book series.
